code: @Test public void testJson() {     PurchaseOrder purchaseOrder = new PurchaseOrder().     purchaseOrder.setName("foo").     XStreamDataFormat xStreamDataFormat = new XStreamDataFormat().     xStreamDataFormat.setXstreamDriver(new JsonHierarchicalStreamDriver()).     XStream xStream = xStreamDataFormat.createXStream(context.getClassResolver(), context.getApplicationContextClassLoader()).     String marshalledOrder = xStream.toXML(purchaseOrder).     assertEquals("{", marshalledOrder.substring(0, 1)). }
